initMsg: Hello world! The bot has returned. Exdia probably restarted me. :)))
unknownCmdMsg: Unknown command or you didn't say a command, try again with a real command or say %help for a full list of commands.
helpCmdMsg: Type %help by itself or add any command and see what that particular command does.
helpPauseMsg: Pauses the bot from listening to commands until it is unpaused using `!unpause`.
helpSayMsg: Makes the bot say whatever you want it to say.
